meaning: intention, plan, resolve, aspire, motive, hopes, shilling

onyomiExamples.meaning: intention, aim, preference (for), orientation (towards a goal)
wishes of a deceased person, dying wish
fixing one's aim in life, deciding one's life goal

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to plan, to intend, to aspire to, to set aims (sights on)
will, resolution, intention, ambition, aim, goal, kindness, goodwill, kind offer, gift (as a token of gratitude)

kunyomiExamples.reading: こころざしはまつのはにつつめ
kunyomiExamples.meaning: for gifts, it's the thought that counts

kunyomiExamples.reading: せいうんのこころざし
